errors.name: CollectionSymbolInvalid
errors.msg: The NFT collection symbol you entered is invalid.

errors.name: VerifiedCreatorsInvalid
errors.msg: There should be 1 to 5 verified creators.

errors.name: CollectionVerificationFailed
errors.msg: Failed to verify if the NFT belongs to the collection.

errors.name: LockerDurationInvalid
errors.msg: Locking duration entered by you is too long.

errors.name: BucketEmpty
errors.msg: There are no NFTs in the bucket.

errors.name: LockerExpired
errors.msg: The locker has expired and it's up for liquidation.

errors.name: LockerActive
errors.msg: The locker is still active and not up for liquidation.

errors.name: DropletsInsufficient
errors.msg: You have insufficient droplets to unlock NFT.

errors.name: InterestScalerInvalid
errors.msg: Interest scaler entered by you is larger than the max value.

errors.name: LockersDisabled
errors.msg: Lockers feature is disabled on this collection.

errors.name: AdminAccessUnauthorized
errors.msg: You do not have administrator access.

errors.name: SolventTreasuryInvalid
errors.msg: The Solvent treasury account entered by you is invalid.

errors.name: LockerAccessUnauthorized
errors.msg: The locker is not owned by you.

errors.name: FarmingParamsInvalid
errors.msg: If farming is enabled, farming params must have all 5 Pubkeys.

errors.name: FarmConfigInvalid
errors.msg: The farm is not suitable for staking.

errors.name: StakingDisabled
errors.msg: Auto-staking feature is disabled on this collection.

errors.name: StakingCooldownPending
errors.msg: The staked NFT is in cooldown period, please wait and try again.
